firstNightReminder: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.
name: Noble
ability: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.

firstNightReminder: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.
name: Knight
ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.

otherNightReminder: If either alive neighbor died by execution today, all players are safe from the Demon tonight.
name: Lion Tamer
ability: If either alive neighbor died by execution today, all players are safe from the Demon tonight.

firstNightReminder: If the dead outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character.
otherNightReminder: If the dead outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character.
name: King
ability: Each night, if the dead outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows who you are.

otherNightReminder: You learn a character that died tonight.
name: Insomniac
ability: Each night*, you learn a character that died tonight.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon kills the King, you learn who the Demon is.
name: Choirboy
ability: If the Demon kills the King, you learn who the Demon is. [+1 King]

name: Poppy Grower
ability: The evil players don’t know who each other are. Upon death, the demon and minions learn each other.

name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

name: Wizard
ability: Once per game, during the day, you may visit the storyteller and make a wish. If granted, your wish may have a price & leaves a clue as to its nature.

name: Copycat
ability: Copies another living minion’s ability. If there are no other living minions, storyteller gives you another minion ability.

otherNightReminder: Each night*, choose a character. They die. If that character isn’t in the game, a player dies.
name: Ojo
ability: Each night*, choose a character. They die. If that character isn’t in the game, a player dies.
